text: We work on videos probably three to four
months in advance, but before that, like,
they're set an ideation where we brainstorm
what they are for a month or two. So
from start to when they get uploaded,
it's probably like one to two months
coming up with the idea, three to four
months working on the idea, and then
a couple weeks filming, and then like
three weeks editing. So probably five
months from start to finish. Two years
ago, we were spending a hundred grand
on video, now we're spending probably
